name: VueCosha
description: VueCosha is a vue directive wrapper for the cosha library. Cosha adds colourful shadows to your images.

name: Personal Website
description: This website is built using Vite ('the opinionated web dev build tool'), using Vue3 and vue-router-next. It is also using tailwind for styling.

name: Revision
description: Revision was a hacked Minecraft client that featured hacks such as wallhack, blockESP and auto item replacement.

name: NotBotAPI
description: NotBotAPI was a pluggable api that allowed developers to perfom more 'human-like' automated actions by simulating real user inputs.
